潁字的基本解释

潁
yǐng
见“颍”。

潁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǐng］
［《廣韻》餘頃切，上静，以。］
亦作“泂2”。“颍1”的繁体字。
(1)水名。源出河南省登封县嵩山西南，东南流到商水县、纳沙河、贾鲁河，至安徽省寿县正阳关入淮河。
(2)古地名。位于河南省登封县东，颍水以北。本为春秋时周邑，后属郑。秦时属颍川郡。晋时属许昌。
(3)姓。春秋郑有颍考叔。见《左传·隐公元年》。

潁字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　潁； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页648第11
【唐韻】余頃切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】庾頃切，?音穎。水名。【周禮·夏官·職方氏】荆州，其浸潁湛。【水經】潁水，出潁川陽城縣西北少室山。　又【前漢·地理志】潁陽、潁隂、臨潁、三縣皆屬潁川郡。○按《正字通》入頁部，今依《說文》，凡熲穎㯋潁俱改入火禾木水等部。

Basic explanation of words
Ying
yǐng
See "ying".
Ying
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǐng］
["Guang Yun" Yu Qing cut, Shang Jing, to. ]
Also known as "Big 2". Traditional characters for "颍1".
(1) Water name. It originates from the southwest of Songshan Mountain in Dengfeng County, Henan Province, flows southeast to Shangshui County, Nasha River, and Jialu River, and enters the Huai River at Zhengyangguan, Shou County, Anhui Province.
(2) Ancient place names. Located in the east of Dengfeng County, Henan Province, north of Yingshui. Originally Zhou Yi during the Spring and Autumn Period, later belonged to Zheng. In Qin, it belonged to Yingchuan County. Jin Dynasty belonged to Xuchang.
(3) Last name. Chun Qiu Zheng Youying Kao Uncle. See "Zuo Zhuan · Yin AD Year".
Ying
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　颍; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 648 to 11
[Tang Yun] Yu Qing cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Yu Qing cut,? Yin Ying. Water name. 【Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Zhi Fang Shi】Jingzhou, its immersion in Yingzhan. 【Shui Jing】Yingshui, out of Shaoshi Mountain in the northwest of Yangcheng County, Yingchuan.　[Former Han Geography] Yingyang, Yingyin, Linying, and the three counties belong to Yingchuan County. ○According to the entry section of "Zhengzitong", according to "Shuowen", all the 熲ying㯋颍 will be changed into the Huohemushui and other departments.
